scripts.calm: I understand deciding on life insurance can be overwhelming and it's natural to take time to consider your options.
scripts.confident: Many clients feel the same, but taking even a small step now can provide peace of mind and lock in better rates. The younger and healthier you are, the more affordable life insurance is.
scripts.close: Have you decided to postpone or do you have a policy in place? I'll guide you through the process step by step.

scripts.calm: I apologize for the inconvenience then. I was looking for the client because I was about to follow up with them about tailoring a Life Insurance quote.
scripts.confident: But since you've picked up I'm super happy that we are talking! We actually offer a variety of insurance solutions.
scripts.close: I'd love to share some information that might be useful to you or someone you know. Let me ask you...

title: 3. How did you get my info?

scripts.calm: I definitely understand why you might want to be cautious. Your information was shared because you previously showed interest in insurance on social media or online ads.
scripts.confident: At Specialty Life Insurance, we work with trusted partners who help us connect with people who may benefit from our services.
scripts.close: Let me quickly confirm a few details so we can make sure this is actually relevant for you. Does that sound fair?

scripts.calm: I understand, the economy is not good and a lot of Canadians are struggling to make ends meet right now.
scripts.confident: This is exactly why we called. Life Insurance is not for wealthy people, it's for protecting families from financial burden once we are gone.
scripts.close: We can provide you with a customized quote to save in your email for when you are ready. What is your best email?

scripts.calm: I definitely don't want to waste your time. If we just send a general email, it won't be accurate for your specific age and health.
scripts.confident: Here in SLI we customize the quotes for our clients; that way our options end up being a lot more inexpensive than a general quote.
scripts.close: I'll have the advisor join for just a moment to customize that for you. Are you near your email now?

scripts.calm: I completely understand why you might feel like the prices online are too expensive. Online info is usually very generic.
scripts.confident: That is why it's beneficial to have a short discussion with an advisor to provide a personalized and relevant quote based on your actual budget.
scripts.close: It only takes a moment to see the real rates. Let me verify your profile here.

scripts.calm: I completely understand. It's smart to be cautious these days. Our number shows as a VoIP service which is standard industry practice.
scripts.confident: We are a legit Canadian-based company in Concord, Ontario, in business for 14 years. You can verify our credentials on the Department of Insurance website.
scripts.close: I'll be happy to provide our credentials. Let me quickly verify who I am speaking with first.

scripts.calm: That's completely understandable! I'm calling to help you get a customized quote that will be much more inexpensive than online rates.
scripts.confident: My goal is to save you money while providing the best possible coverage options for your family.
scripts.close: To not waste too much of your time, let me quickly confirm your details here.

scripts.calm: I completely understand your point of view. The reason we do not leave voicemails is to protect your privacy.
scripts.confident: Because we deal with personal, private, and sensitive health information, we only speak directly with our clients.
scripts.close: Now that we have you on the line, let's see if we can get you that information you were looking for.

scripts.calm: Many people feel life insurance is only for those with dependents, and I hear that a lot.
scripts.confident: However, it still protects your financial legacyâ€”covering final expenses, debts, or leaving a gift to a cause you care about while locking in low rates.
scripts.close: In case your needs change in the future, it's best to have this in place. Do you have a plan for final expenses?

scripts.calm: I completely understand your concern. Online reviews are important and we take customer feedback very seriously.
scripts.confident: At Specialty Life, we strive to prioritize our clients and ensure they are well taken care of with coverage that truly suits their needs.
scripts.close: I'd love the opportunity to show you our service first-hand. Let me quickly verify your profile here.

scripts.calm: I apologize for that experience. Many companies have very strict medical requirements.
scripts.confident: We offer guaranteed coverage options with no medical exams involved in any of our policies. Even if you've been declined before, we can help.
scripts.close: Let me see which of our guaranteed products fits you best. How long ago was the decline?

scripts.calm: I completely understand your point of view. It's understandable to have privacy concerns when talking about personal health.
scripts.confident: You can rest assured that these concerns have been considered and we use high-level security to protect your data.
scripts.close: This is a standard requirement to ensure your quote is handled accurately. Shall we continue with the verification?

scripts.calm: I totally understand and respect your point of view. Privacy is very important.
scripts.confident: However, age and health are essential factors for life insurance. We have to make sure the information on our end is correct to give you a valid price.
scripts.close: I want to make sure I don't give you a wrong quote. Can we just verify the year of birth?

scripts.calm: I apologize, we don't offer those specific products like dental or auto insurance.
scripts.confident: However, we specialize in affordable life insurance that protects your family's future at a very low cost.
scripts.close: While I have you here, let's see what customized life options you qualify for. It only takes 2 minutes.

scripts.calm: I understand where you're coming from. I have your name and date of birth here on my record.
scripts.confident: It's possible a loved one or spouse inquired on your behalf. Our priority is just providing value to those who might benefit from coverage.
scripts.close: Do you currently have a plan in place to ensure your family doesn't have to pay out of pocket for final expenses?

scripts.calm: I completely understand that, and providing the price is exactly the reason for this call!
scripts.confident: Because rates are based on your specific details, I just need to complete your profile to customize that quote for your budget.
scripts.close: To not waste your time, let's finish these last two details. What is your current height?

scripts.calm: That's great! It's good to have that part covered. However, most work policies don't stay with you if you switch jobs.
scripts.confident: We need a 'Plan B' that you own personally. We can customize a free quote so you can compare it to your work policy and see the difference.
scripts.close: Would you like to see what a portable policy looks like for your age? It's often cheaper than people think.

scripts.calm: I totally understand. It's smart to compare options when looking for the best protection.
scripts.confident: We called to present you some quotes with no obligation at all so you can compare our products with what other companies have to offer.
scripts.close: At least you'll have our rates as a benchmark. Let's see how our numbers look for you.

scripts.calm: It's great that you have already taken steps to secure a policy with us!
scripts.confident: We are calling to check if you need any upgrades or to ensure your coverage still fits your current needs.
